title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan cheese.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat.
Stir in egg and cheese mixture quickly to avoid scrambling eggs.
Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a rich, creamy, tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 1 hour.
Fry onions until golden, add tomato puree and cream.
Add grilled chicken to sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
